welcome_message_title: Welcome to Sao Tiago de Custoias
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sao Tiago de Custoias, Portugal! Get ready to be charmed by our beautiful coastal city known for its rich history, picturesque views, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and savor all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a login is required.
